name: How to Use CurrikiStudio
description: Our partners are full of ideas on how to engage learners, but need the tools…and that’s where we come in. Curriki is on a mission to make educational resources open, free, and easy to create. This is a sample playlist to help CurrikiStudio authors create learning programs and playlists. Happy building!
